name: Fast AWS
author: FastFlow

sections.description:
Fast AWS is designed to work seamlessly with Fast Member and the Fast Flow Dashboard

Using Fast AWS you can protect your Fast Member download links on Amazon S3

There is support for the following endpoint regions

us-east-1 — s3-external-1.amazonaws.com
us-west-2 — s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com
us-west-1 — s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com
eu-west-1 — s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com
ap-southeast-1 — s3-ap-southeast-1.amazonaws.com
ap-southeast-2 — s3-ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com
ap-northeast-1 — s3-ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com
sa-east-1 — s3-sa-east-1.amazonaws.com

NOTE: Fast AWS requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to manage the settings.

https://wordpress.org/plugins/fast-flow-dashboard/

You can find out more about Fast Flow and Fast Member here

https://fastflow.io

https://fastmember.com
sections.installation:
NOTE: This plugin requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to add the AWS settings.

Upload through your WordPress admin or via FTP.

Once uploaded simply activate and then navigate to the Fast Flow Dashboard settings and add your AWS key pair.
sections.changelog:
1.1.2

Fix for error with file sub directories

1.1.1

Update to functions based on WordPress guidelines

1.1.0

  • Prepared for repository release
